Module dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform
Package dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform

Class GameSystem

java.lang.Object
dev.kkorolyov.pancake.platform.GameSystem
public abstract class GameSystem extends Object
Performs work on entities matching a certain component signature.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
    protected
    GameSystem(Class<? extends Component>... signature)
    Constructs a new system with signature defining the minimum component set of entities processed by this system.

  • Method Details

    • update

      protected abstract void update(Entity entity, long dt)
      Invoked on each entity affected by this system.
      Parameters:
      entity - entity to update
      dt - ns elapsed since last update to this system

    • before

      protected void before()
      Invoked at the beginning of an update cycle. Intended for any static pre-update logic.

    • after

      protected void after()
      Invoked at the end of an update cycle. Intended for any static post-update logic.

      Returns a new entity.

      Destroys entity by id.

      Attaches resources to this system.

    • update

      Executes a single update on this system with dt (ns) timestep.

    • getSignature
